subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: A month after Kyrgios’s racket-smashing, profanity-laced run at Wimbledon, he was back at the center of a storm after making unsavory remarks to Wawrinka during a match Wednesday.
snippet: A month after Kyrgios’s racket-smashing, profanity-laced run at Wimbledon, he was back at the center of a storm after making unsavory remarks to Wawrinka during a match Wednesday.
